subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi became the first player to score five goals in a Champions League match, helping defending champion Barcelona crush visiting Bayer Leverkusen, 7-1.
snippet: Lionel Messi became the first player to score five goals in a Champions League match, helping defending champion Barcelona crush visiting Bayer Leverkusen, 7-1.
